import React from 'react'; import './Post.css' import {Avatar} from "@material-ui/core"; import postimage from '../../images/post.jpg' import love from '../../images/love.svg' import comment from '../../images/comment.svg' import share from '../../images/share.svg' function Post({post}) { return (
{post.userName}
{post.likes} likes
Hello Comment

); }; export default Post;
